name: Star of the Sea Clinic
description: Operated by Patrick D. Flanigan, FNP-C, this clinic offers in-person and virtual care grounded in Catholic values, including holistic primary care, behavioral health, and end-of-life care

name: MyCatholicDoctor (Functional Medicine Services)
address: Services are primarily telehealth/virtual care. Specific physical locations for functional medicine providers in South Dakota were not found
description: This organization connects patients with faithful medical professionals, including those who integrate Catholic spirituality into their care. They offer functional medicine services, which are individualized and science-based

name: David Wachs, M.D. (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Dr. Wachs is a Family Practice Physician who sees patients of all ages for general medical needs and behavioral health, with a special interest in infertility care, family planning, geriatrics, and end-of-life care from a Catholic perspective

name: Patrick D. Flanigan, FNP-C (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Patrick Flanigan is a Family Nurse Practitioner who sees adults and children for urgent conditions, primary care, and chronic disease management. He also provides fitness and nutrition counseling, end-of-life care, and advance healthcare planning consultation

name: Jeffrey Vacek, DNP FNP-C (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Jeffrey Vacek is a Family Nurse Practitioner who sees patients ages 4 and up for primary care, chronic conditions, and urgent care concerns

name: Susanne Godsey, PA-C (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Susanne Godsey is a Physician Assistant specializing in FEMM Medical Management, with a special interest in Women's Health and using FEMM for Restorative Reproductive medicine

name: Chiron Healing Arts (Homeopathy)
address: Not specified in search results, but operates in South Dakota
description: This practice offers homeopathy for children and adults, addressing mental, emotional, and physical complaints. The practitioner, Dr. Blake, has had success with various conditions using homeopathy

name: Sanford Integrative Health & Wellness
address: Sioux Falls, SD (Specific street address not provided in search results)
description: This center offers evidence-based, holistic care for mind, body, and spirit, including services like acupressure, acupuncture, aromatherapy, and healing touch. While not exclusively Catholic-owned, it offers a holistic approach

name: Rev. Fr. Christopher Smith, PharmD (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Father Smith is a Doctor of Pharmacy who provides consultation regarding medications and vaccines, especially concerning medical ethics from a Catholic perspective

name: Marie Claire Roderick PSYD (MyCatholicDoctor)
description: Dr. Roderick specializes in adult and family psychotherapy
